statements: SELECT * FROM InventoryTransactions ORDER BY transaction_date DESC LIMIT 10
SELECT transaction_type, quantity_change FROM InventoryTransactions WHERE product_id = 1
SELECT transaction_id, transaction_type, quantity_change FROM InventoryTransactions WHERE quantity_change > 0
SELECT * FROM InventoryTransactions WHERE quantity_change < -5 ORDER BY transaction_date ASC
SELECT product_id, COUNT(*) AS total_transactions FROM InventoryTransactions GROUP BY product_id HAVING total_transactions > 5
SELECT * FROM InventoryTransactions WHERE transaction_type = 'purchase' ORDER BY transaction_date DESC LIMIT 3
SELECT transaction_id, product_id, quantity_change FROM InventoryTransactions WHERE quantity_change > 0 ORDER BY transaction_id ASC
SELECT * FROM InventoryTransactions ORDER BY product_id, transaction_date DESC
SELECT transaction_id, transaction_type, quantity_change FROM InventoryTransactions WHERE transaction_type = 'sale' ORDER BY transaction_date ASC
SELECT DISTINCT transaction_type FROM InventoryTransactions
SELECT * FROM InventoryTransactions;
SELECT transaction_id, transaction_type, quantity FROM InventoryTransactions ORDER BY transaction_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM InventoryAuditTrail WHERE user_id = 123;
SELECT transaction_id, transaction_type FROM InventoryTransactions WHERE product_id IN (1, 2, 3);
SELECT MAX(quantity) AS max_quantity FROM InventoryTransactions;
SELECT * FROM InventoryTransactions WHERE quantity > 100;
SELECT transaction_id, product_id, quantity FROM InventoryTransactions ORDER BY transaction_date DESC;
SELECT transaction_id, transaction_type, quantity FROM InventoryTransactions WHERE product_id = 5 AND transaction_date < '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM InventoryAuditTrail WHERE user_id = 10 ORDER BY audit_date DESC;
SELECT AVG(quantity) AS average_quantity, MAX(quantity) AS max_quantity FROM InventoryTransactions;
SELECT * FROM StockAdditions;
SELECT product_id, quantity_added FROM StockAdditions WHERE quantity_added > 10;
SELECT added_date, added_by_user FROM StockAdditions ORDER BY added_date DESC;
SELECT adjustment_id, reason, adjusted_by_user FROM StockAdjustments WHERE reason = 'Damaged';
SELECT transfer_id, source_location, destination_location, transfer_date FROM StockTransfers ORDER BY transfer_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM StockAdditions
SELECT product_id, quantity_added FROM StockAdditions ORDER BY added_date DESC
SELECT DISTINCT added_by_user FROM StockAdditions WHERE quantity_added > 100
SELECT SUM(quantity_transferred) AS total_transferred FROM StockTransfers GROUP BY product_id
SELECT adjustment_id, reason, adjustment_date FROM StockAdjustments WHERE quantity_adjusted < 0 ORDER BY adjustment_date
SELECT * FROM stock_additions ORDER BY transaction_date DESC;
SELECT product_name, quantity FROM inventory_transactions WHERE quantity > 10;
SELECT product_name, quantity FROM adjustments WHERE reason LIKE '%damage%';
SELECT DISTINCT product_name FROM transfers;
SELECT * FROM stock_additions WHERE quantity BETWEEN 50 AND 100 ORDER BY quantity DESC, transaction_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM stock_additions ORDER BY transaction_date DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT product_name, quantity FROM transfers WHERE from_location = 'Warehouse A';
SELECT id, reason, quantity FROM adjustments WHERE quantity >= 10 AND transaction_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT id, transaction_type, product_name, quantity, transaction_date FROM inventory_transactions WHERE transaction_type = 'Outbound' ORDER BY quantity DESC;
SELECT * FROM stock_additions WHERE product_name LIKE '%keyboard%' AND quantity > 0;
SELECT * FROM StockTransactions;
SELECT transaction_id, timestamp, transaction_type FROM StockTransactions WHERE quantity > 10;
SELECT product_name, category, quantity_on_hand FROM StockProducts ORDER BY quantity_on_hand DESC;
SELECT * FROM StockAdditions WHERE added_on >= '2021-06-01';
SELECT transfer_id, from_location, to_location, product_id FROM StockTransfers WHERE quantity_transferred < 5;
SELECT * FROM StockTransactions WHERE quantity > 100 ORDER BY transaction_id DESC;
SELECT product_name, category, quantity_on_hand FROM StockProducts WHERE category = 'Electronics';
SELECT transfer_id, from_location, to_location, quantity_transferred, transfer_date FROM StockTransfers WHERE quantity_transferred <= 50 ORDER BY transfer_date ASC;
SELECT product_name, unit_price FROM StockProducts WHERE quantity_on_hand < 20 AND unit_price > 500 ORDER BY unit_price DESC;
SELECT addition_id, product_id, quantity_added, added_by, added_on FROM StockAdditions WHERE added_on >= '2021-01-01' ORDER BY added_on DESC;
